definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: a Jebusite, whose threshing-floor was bought by David to erect an altar 1Ch 21:15, 1Ch 21:18, 1Ch 21:20, 1Ch 21:20, 1Ch 21:21, 1Ch 21:21, 1Ch 21:22, 1Ch 21:23, 1Ch 21:24, 1Ch 21:25, 1Ch 21:28, & acc. to 2Ch 3:1 became site of temple; called [[אֲרַוְנׇה]] 2Sa 24:16 f. q.v.
